title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2007)
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Melbourne (Vic.) - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Melbourne (Vic.) - Social conditions
abstract: Eleven stories from the general public, created at ACMI in Federation Square.
description: Eleven stories from members of the general public. Mostly autobiographical, they are stories that concern themselves mostly with the passions of the creator, whether social issues, history, hobbies or family. These passions and interests are what makes the participants who they are.
